title: Game keeps repairing
body:
I just recently started playing League, and I'm having a tonne of fun.
But more so than often my game keeps disconnecting me because of repair issues.
I've reinstalled the game 3 times this week, and this happens daily, and I keep getting leaverbuster over something I have no control over.

Does this happen to much people, and could this get my account permanently banned?

Tia.

replies.body:
First off, this won't be getting your account banned so no worries there. If you do end up getting disconnected enough though, there's a chance of you being hit with a low priority queue since so many games were interrupted by those disconnects. I don't want that to happen of course, so let's make sure we take a step back and troubleshoot this in some custom or practice games.

Since those repairs haven't been helping so far, it might mean that something went wrong when League was installing. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything gets installed again from square one.
